divs: sighting details2 witness two towns apart see same object. a friend calls me at 23:05 and says he saw a beam of light come down then noticed a bright object, too big and luminous to be a star or planet. he was about 17miles north from here, i went out to my driveway and saw the same object. a random pulsating red light was showing at the top. other light anomolies were blinking under it's 5 o'clock position which he confirmed he also saw. observed for 20minutes before i went in. and he lost view after going behind mountain. have noticed the same type of thing was seen from here on 4\11\2011.
Summary: Hovering bright object with red light pulsing on top ..star like
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Rutland
There were no other sightings in Rutland on or around November 14th 2013
